sentence.Network_cn: 这个建议完全是荒唐可笑的.

sentence.Network_en: The entire proposal is risible: it will never is accepted.

sentence.Network_en: Man is the only risible animal.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类是唯一“能笑的”动物.

risibility的用法例句1. risibility n. 爱笑的性质, 爱笑的癖性, 对笑的感受性更多
英语:有人知道爱笑的天使怎么用英文说么... ... guardian angel: 守护天使 risible angel: 爱笑的天使 Azrael: n. 死神,死的天使.
man is the only risible animal., 人类是唯一能笑的动物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'inclined to laughter'): from late Latin risibilis, from Latin ris- 'laughed', from the verb ridere

entry.def: If you describe something as risible, you mean that it is ridiculous and does not deserve to be taken seriously.

sentences.sentence: "an amusing film with a steady stream of pranks and pratfalls"
"it would have been laughable if it hadn't hurt so much"

auth_sentence.content: The reasons given are risible by the doubters.

auth_sentence.content: Your objections, to use your own words, are fantastical and risible.
